questions.question: Inside which HTML element do we put the JavaScript?
Where is the correct place to insert a JavaScript?
options: Both the <head> section and the <body> section are correct
questions.answer: Both the <head> section and the <body> section are correct

questions.question: Which type of JavaScript language is ___
Which of the following is not a valid JavaScript variable name?
How does JavaScript store dates in a date object?
options: The number of milliseconds since January 1st, 1970
The number of days since January 1st, 1900
The number of seconds since Netscape's public stock offering
questions.answer: The number of milliseconds since January 1st, 1970

questions.question: What does the <noscript> tag do?
options: Enclose text to be displayed by non-JavaScript browsers.
Prevents scripts on the page from executing.
questions.answer: Enclose text to be displayed by non-JavaScript browsers.

questions.question: Which type of JavaScript language is ___
What is mean by (this) keyword in javascript?
options: It is variable which contains value
